channel.title: Minigame HELP-HOW TO RANDOM ATTACK+ teleport

item.title: Minigame HELP-HOW TO RANDOM ATTACK+ teleport
item.dc:creator: @finzy finzy
item.description:
@finzy wrote:

hey people im making a minigame for my server and i want a monster to attack, as well as teleport on death

here is the npchandler part for the monster

                        }
                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2882) {
                            int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
                            client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
                            ppl.teleportToX = 2929; // Change coordinates
                            ppl.teleportToY = 3673; // Change coordinates
                        }

as you see it teleports to 2929 3673 but i also want it to attack, can somone add that command and paste it in this forum PLZ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 03:26:05 PM[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 09:30:15 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
